name: Slappy Board (itch)
description:
Go in the board meeting of Slappy Inc. where you're giving a presentation about the new Slappy Stick! But there is one person trying to disturb the meeting by spreading malicious intent to the other employees. 

Give your presentation, find the instigator, and bring him down to earth.

Controls PC-player:
xbox -controller: 

  • shoulder-left: switch to character on the left
  • shoulder-right: switch to character on the right
  • a-button: trigger current selected character

alternative keyboard:

  • Arrow Keys: cycle between characters
  • Enter: trigger current selected character

Controls VR-player:

VR-controller:

  • grip- button: grab object
  • trigger button: teleport to location
  • Joystick: rotate view direction of teleport
